comments: I took an online course and she said to email her if I had any questions. Well, I had lots of them and she never answered any of my questions. She didn\'t want to deal with me. Would not recommend this professor to anyone!

comments: She doesn\'t actually do much for the online classes. She sends random emails reminding about tests, but other than that everything is in the Pearson MyStatsLab site. She\'s hit or miss on whether or not she responds to emails quickly, but even if she does her responses aren\'t always helpful. Doesn\'t seem super friendly.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)

comments: Pretty much the worst experience I\'ve had with professors. Half the class dropped and the other half had failing averages. There was little homework but tons of quizzes and tests. No partial credit whatsoever, so be prepared to lose points for dumb reasons. Didn\'t have very clear examples. If I could I would have taken summer term with Thompson.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Extremely hard quizzes. I don\'t consider myself a dumbass by any means and I got a 40% average in the quiz category. The tests are not extremely hard, but you will have to study and work hard at it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Explanations of mathematical theories are always vague and lacking clarity. Syllabus stated we had homework worth 15% of our grade and never had any. Nice? Yeah, but not when it came to the final grade calc. Test questions are worth about 10pts each, and you miss one tiny thing - whole problem marked wrong. She also forgot we had a final. Avoid her

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: FYI, she does not give any partial credit which screwed me a few times. The quizzes and hw killed me in the class; i averaged a D in both. I got B\'s on tests and an A on the final exam. She can be very confusing. I recommend using study tests and pretest study session she offers. She is not good at communicating, and you have to be pushy with her.

comments: She penalized me for missing class due to jury duty, and scheduled doctors appointments. She even had advanced notice. I guess her class is more important than a functioning democracy or a students health. I am disabled, and I am planning on filing charges against Terri Torres for violating the ADA and Federal Laws. Go back to Georgia you hick.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: I went in to this class after taking Math 252 Integral Calc. I thought it would be an easy A. I was wrong. This is MathPsychologyEnglish. I have never written so many paragraphs, and done so little math in math class in my life. She brought the wrong text to the first class, and I consequently did over 10 hw assignments with the wrong problems!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She was completely uninvolved in the course, we had to self-teach from an online textbook and website. All exams and assignments were graded by the website itself. She wasn\'t great at responding to email correspondence, and when she did it was very abrupt and not always helpful. Did not feel supported by her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She covers the material well in class. Unclear when it comes to exams and quiz\'s. She will not tell you what material will be on the upcoming quiz\'s. She does not do review before an exam. She will not give partial credit, you may write the equation correct, or work it correct most the way through and mess up on the end, but mark it wrong.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: I heartily recommend Prof. Torres to anyone who is curious about how students form math phobias or test anxiety, as well as anyone who enjoys having their GPA ruined for panicking on a test and making a minor algebra mistake, likes unclear explanations, or loves getting dinged for not showing work when using the power rule (?!). Bad, bad, bad.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: No clarity on assignments, no partial credit on tests, long feedback waiting times, little to no grading on homework. One of the many math teachers to avoid at Oregon Tech.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Wrong book on the syllabus and when we told her she acted like it wasn\'t her problem. Zero feedback on tests, no information on what will be on tests, no partial credit. Lectures often didn\'t make any sense.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Awful, horrible, dreadful, traumatizing. Did not reply to emails until right before deadlines. Was extremely rude until I said I was thinking about going to the dean of students, then she cleaned up her act.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Terri is awesome. Had to go to class because it was a work at your own pace online math class but she is helpful,sweet, and adores students who put in effort.
